name: Sir John and the Cursed Castle
name_original: Sir John and the Cursed Castle
description:
Controls:

W,A,S,D / Arrow Keys = Move

P Pause

Ludum Dare 37 Jam submission made by @ikarus318 and @lynnycat13. Tools used: Unity, tiled, Photoshop/Gimp, sfxr (sound effects), abundant-music.com (music).
